hanzi-su-wiki:
庫

Значения

Склад, кладовая

Мнемоника

Крытое 广 помещение, куда на телегах 車 свозят товары.

Варианты

库

(Simplified: 库)
Ideographic: A stable 广 where carriages 車 are parked
purpleculture_examples: 庫存 [ kù cún ]: property or cash held in reserve; stock

heisig_chinese_memo: I think of the Batcave. It's a big cave that Batman uses as a warehouse to store his car, the Batmobile, and all his cool big-boy toys.
koohiiStory1: I think of the Batcave. It´s a big cave that Batman uses as a warehouse to store his car, the Batmobile, and all his cool big-boy toys.
koohiiStory2: Have you ever worked in a warehouse? It´s like a giant metal cave. Watch out for that forklift!
jp_example_words:
金庫(かねぐら): safe, vault, treasury, provider of funds
在庫(ざいこ): stockpile, stock
金庫(きんこ): safe, vault, treasury, provider of funds
車庫(しゃこ): garage
倉庫(そうこ): storehouse, warehouse
冷蔵庫(れいぞうこ): refrigerator
jp_readingExamples: 倉庫 (そうこ), 文庫 (ぶんこ), 車庫 (しゃこ)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: A canopy is over your car because your car is in storage in a large warehouse.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: The canopy just protects your car from the elements as it sits in storage for long periods of time.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Your car is in this storage warehouse, just sitting there. A 子 (こ) notices this, and decides to take your car on a joyride. You won't notice, right? You never drive it.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine a kid sneaking into your canopy to steal your car that's in storage. Maybe it's two 子s, one stacked on the other with a trench coat. One 子 works the pedals while the other 子 works the steering.
Ru_trainchinese: kù: (сущ) склад, хранилище; арсенал; база, библиотека; запасы
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the car (車) under the stony cliff (广) is in a warehouse
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: A car warehouse is basically a cave with cars.
humanum_full_description_en:
Bronze inscriptions from "广" to " car ", "广" or "宀", " factory " form, "广" and "宀" both indicate the meaning of being in the house, and will store the car in the warehouse , The original meaning is warehouse. "Shuowen": "The library, the army is in the storage. From the car to the Guangxia." Duan Yucai: "In extension, all storage is called a library."

Jinwen " ku " means a collection of military vehicles and weapons, Shangjun Arsenal: "Upjun Arsenal" It is also the name of the government treasury institution. Four-year Youkugo: "Four Years Youkuye is the casting of beggars."
humanum_short_description_en: The meaning of " library " in gold inscriptions is to store the car in the warehouse. The original meaning is warehouse.
humanum_full_description:
金文從「广」從「車」，「广」或作「宀」、「厂」形，「广」、「宀」皆表示在屋內之意，會存放車在倉庫中之意，本義是倉庫。《說文》：「庫，兵車藏也。从車在广下。」段玉裁：「引伸之，凡貯物舍皆曰庫。」

　　金文「庫」表示收藏兵車及武器之所，上郡武庫戈：「上郡武庫」。又是府庫機構的名稱，四年右庫戈：「四年右庫冶乞之鑄。」
humanum_short_description: 金文「庫」會存放車在倉庫中之意，本義是倉庫。

金文從「 广 」從「 車 」，「 广 」或作「 宀 」、「 厂 」形，「 广 」、「 宀 」皆表示在屋內之意，會存放車在倉庫中之意，本義是倉庫。《說文》：「庫，兵車藏也。从車在广下。」段玉裁：「引伸之，凡貯物舍皆曰庫。」 金文「 庫 」表示收藏兵車及武器之所，上郡武庫戈：「上郡武庫」。又是府庫機構的名稱，四年右庫戈：「四年右庫冶乞之鑄。」
Bronze inscriptions from " 广" to " car", " 广" or " 宀", " factory" form, " 广" and " 宀" both indicate the meaning of being in the house, and will store the car in the warehouse , The original meaning is warehouse. "Shuowen": "The library, the army is in the storage. From the car to the Guangxia." Duan Yucai: "In extension, all storage is called a library." Jinwen " ku" means a collection of military vehicles and weapons, Shangjun Arsenal: "Upjun Arsenal" It is also the name of the government treasury institution. Four-year Youkugo: "Four Years Youkuye is the casting of beggars."

庫字的基本解释

庫
kù
见“库”。

庫字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kù］
［《廣韻》苦故切，去暮，溪。］
“库1”的繁体字。
(1)储藏战车兵甲的屋舍。
(2)泛指贮物的屋舍。
(3)监狱。
(4)宋时酒肆称库。
(5)姓。汉有库钧。见《广韵·去暮》。

庫字的康熙字典解释

【寅集下】【广字部】　庫； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页346第14
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?苦故切，苦去聲。【說文】兵車藏也。从車，在广下。【釋名】庫，舍也。物所在之舍也，故齊魯謂庫曰舍。【禮·月令】審五庫之量。【蔡邕·章句】一曰車庫，二曰兵庫，三曰祭庫，四曰樂庫，五曰宴庫。　又天庫，星名。【春秋·文曜鉤】軫南四星曰天庫。天庫，五帝車舍也。　又門名。【禮·郊特牲】庫門之內，戒百官也。【註】庫門，在雉門之外。　又姓。【風俗通】古守庫大夫之後，以官爲氏。

庫字的源字形

字源演变：

金文小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
庫字的起名意思

暂无。

Traditional characters of "库1".
(1) The house where the chariot armor is stored.
(2) Generally refers to the house for storage.
(3) Prison.
(4) Song Shi Jiuchang is called the library.
(5) Last name. Han has Kujun. See "Guangyun·Departure".

kù
вм. 库
Radicals: 广, 車  (canopy, car)
Meaning Mnemonic
A canopy is over your car because your car is in storage in a large warehouse.
The canopy just protects your car from the elements as it sits in storage for long periods of time.
Reading Mnemonic
Your car is in this storage warehouse, just sitting there. A 子 (こ) notices this, and decides to take your car on a joyride. You won't notice, right? You never drive it.
Imagine a kid sneaking into your canopy to steal your car that's in storage. Maybe it's two 子s, one stacked on the other with a trench coat. One 子 works the pedals while the other 子 works the steering.
